root.description: A Solana Bonkfun Bundler is a trading bot that batches multiple Pump.fun (Bonk.fun) buy or sell instructions into one atomic transaction or sends them as a private Jito bundle to Solana validators. It‚Äôs designed to execute trades instantly without exposing them to the public mempool, reducing the risk of front-running or price slippage.
